Issue.creator: amjadnz
Issue.description: 7050-7051/tcp, 7052-7059/tcp 58a17f46f113a9000a123ee3_vp0 Deploy ------------ peer chaincode deploy -p tts/evote_chaincode -c '{"args": "init" }' Output as follows: 10:20:07.802 logging LoggingInit -> DEBU 001 Setting default logging level to DEBUG for command 'chaincode' 10:20:13.432 chaincodeCmd chaincodeDeploy -> INFO 002 Deploy result: type:GOLANG chaincodeID: ctorMsg: Deploy chaincode: 7c870cd9b6ec0659f3ff809b73e70ce54c138b401caa53a264203eb3933ddcf462211aa38513bdede7838ab00cabad90b80f4054bafe583ae9b37a2b52eed4d5 10:20:13.432 main main -> INFO 003 Exiting..... Query chain code ---------------------- So when I do a CURL to query curl -XPOST -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"query","params":{ "type":1,"chaincodeID":{ "name":"7c870cd9b6ec0659f3ff809b73e70ce54c138b401caa53a264203eb3933ddcf462211aa38513bdede7838ab00cabad90b80f4054bafe583ae9b37a2b52eed4d5"},"ctorMsg":{ "args": "queryAccounts","a" },"metadata": 97,115,115,105,103,110,101,114 ,"secureContext":"assigner"},"id": 301}' http://172.18.0.5:7050/chaincode Output: {"jsonrpc":"2.0","error":{"code":-32003,"message":"Query failure","data":"Error when querying chaincode: Error:Failed to launch chaincode spec(Could not get deployment transaction for 7c870cd9b6ec0659f3ff809b73e70ce54c138b401caa53a264203eb3933ddcf462211aa38513bdede7838ab00cabad90b80f4054bafe583ae9b37a2b52eed4d5 - LedgerError - ResourceNotFound: ledger: resource not found)"},"id":301} >
